Name: Zoning, 464 Ovington Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 250057 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 250057 ZRK (464 Ovington Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Geffen Management LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 10, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
